posts.post_title: ISO: T207 Grover Hartley - Anonymous Back FACTORY 25
posts.post_content:
Update: thought I had a complete back run after acquiring the Anonymous Back FACTORY 3. Apparently there's a Factory 25 Anonymous Back, too. So, now I'm looking for one. 
_____________________________

Hi there!

Always interested in buying T207 Grover Hartley. 

Grover Hartley was the manager of the minor league team my uncle played on in 1939, and the same one my grandpa played on in 1940. 

Thank you in advance!

Glad you put a post up! Good luck!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

[quote name="biggsdaddycool" post=1559191]Glad you put a post up! Good luck!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk[/QUOTE]

Thank you! If you have any leads, let me know!

Broadleaf & Cycle acquired. Still need Anonymous back. 

Will look at any lower-grade Hartley as well, even if I already have the back.
